data.title: Pentair IntelliChlor, iChlor and IntelliFlo Pool Equipment, Page 2
data.text:
Reputation for Energy Efficiency

As a trusted partner of ENERGY STAR since 2013, Pentair continues to lead the way in sustainable pool technology.

At DSP, we pride ourselves on being experts on Pentair pool products, especially their innovative Intelliflo and Intellichlor technologies. These cutting-edge technologies can transform your saltwater pool experience and save you money on energy costs.

Get the best of Pentair pool products and expert advice when you buy from Discount Salt Pool. With the latest technology in saltwater pool pumps and filters, such as Pentair’s IntelliFlo and IntelliChlor, you can experience a hassle-free pool ownership experience.

Our team of experts will guide you through the process, so you can confidently make a purchase that saves you money and offers top-quality performance. Order today and enjoy fast, free shipping on eligible orders!

Ultra Fast Shipping!

Get your Pentair pool products shipped fast with DSP - usually same day! Trust us for quality, value, and top-notch service.

Honest Advice

Our team is made up of experts who have hands-on experience with salt pools and are well-trained to answer any questions you may have. We'll guide you through the process of finding compatible equipment and upgrades, ensuring you get the best value for your money.

Find the Best Product for Any Pool

Find the perfect Pentair pool product for your pool. Our experts will help you get the right equipment for any pool.

Choosing the right Pentair pool products is crucial for an efficient and effective saltwater pool system. We carry many pool products by Pentair such as the:

Intellichlor IC20

Intellichlor IC40

Intellichlor IC60

Ichlor 15

Ichlor 30

And that’s just a few! With so many options available, it can be overwhelming to decide which one is best for you. Our experts are here to help. Give us a call with any and all questions and we'll guide you in choosing the perfect pump for your pool.

Competitive Pricing

Discount Salt Pool is proud to offer wholesale pricing on all Pentair pool products, including the IntelliFlo and IntelliChlor. We leverage our sales volume to ensure fair pricing on all Pentair pool products for all DSP customers. Take advantage of our great deals and get your pool equipped with the latest technology at unbeatable prices.

Your Salt Pool Experts

At DSP, we love to share our salt pool knowledge with you. We're experts in salt pool systems, including Pentair's Intelliflo and Intellichlor. We're confident in our operations, too. You can count on us to deliver your order in just 2-3 business days. Any questions? Just ask! We're here to help you get the perfect salt system for your needs.

Professional & Knowledgeable

At DSP, we're pool owners too and we understand the happiness that comes with owning a salt pool. To maintain your pool, you need the right information. Whether you choose Pentair or another brand, we can provide you with the knowledge you need about salt pool systems. Have questions? Just give us a call and we'll be happy to help you out!

Who We Are:

At Discount Salt Pool, we're pool owners who want to help other pool owners enjoy the simplicity and the savings of saltwater chlorine generators. Unlike the pool store or pool pros, we're not the last step of a long & overpriced distribution chain. We're lifelong swimming pool enthusiasts & experts with decades of experience in the industry who want to give other pool owners direct access to the best pool technology that's out there- along with unlimited access to our friendly customer support and online DIY resources. Discount Salt Pool is a BBB member with an A+ rating.
